My Creative Process

All of my UI/UX and design projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

First of all, we discuss what we expect from each other at what times and negotiate the price of the service.

2

Brainstorming ^ Concept

Then, I connect the dots to make and work out what you want to have.

3

UI/UX Planning

I plan everything in advance, make prototypes, refactor and so forth.

4

Interaction

Finally, you tell me you are fully satisfied with the work that was done and pay for the service.
